verses.verse: For, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> comes, <S%H935><s%> that shall burn <S%H1197><s%> as an oven; <S%H8574><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the proud, <S%H2086><s%> yes, and all <S%H3605><s%> that do <S%H6213><s%> wickedly, <S%H7564><s%> shall be stubble: <S%H7179><s%> and the day <S%H3117><s%> that comes <S%H935><s%> shall burn <S%H3857><s%> them up, said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> that it shall leave <S%H5800><s%> them neither root <S%H8328><s%> nor branch. <S%H6057><s%>

But to you that fear <S%H3373><s%> my name <S%H8034><s%> shall the Sun <S%H8121><s%> of righteousness <S%H6666><s%> arise <S%H2224><s%> with healing <S%H4832><s%> in his wings; <S%H3671><s%> and you shall go <S%H3318><s%> forth, <S%H3318><s%> and grow <S%H6335><s%> up as calves <S%H5695><s%> of the stall. <S%H4770><s%>

And you shall tread <S%H6072><s%> down the wicked; <S%H7563><s%> for they shall be ashes <S%H665><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the soles <S%H3709><s%> of your feet <S%H7272><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> that I shall do <S%H6213><s%> this, said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts. <S%H6635><s%>

Remember <S%H2142><s%> you the law <S%H8451><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%> my servant, <S%H5650><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I commanded <S%H6680><s%> to him in Horeb <S%H2722><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> with the statutes <S%H2706><s%> and judgments. <S%H4941><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will send <S%H7971><s%> you Elijah <S%H452><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the coming <S%H935><s%> of the great <S%H1419><s%> and dreadful <S%H3372><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

And he shall turn <S%H7725><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> to the children, <S%H1121><s%> and the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> to their fathers, <S%H1><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> I come <S%H935><s%> and smite <S%H5221><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> with a curse. <S%H2764><s%>
